User login

JARI
(Java API Reference Implementation)

JARI provides an implementation that incorporates Worldpay standards and best practices to jumpstart API development. JARI was developed by Catalyst. Catalyst enables product delivery teams to work in a more agile manner while driving adoption and reuse of assets and best practices for APIs.


Find out more about Catalyst!
